default: ^This is the default knot, we should not be reading this in game
a: ^I'm here to sell my wand, pleasee buy it!!
^It’s very good… does all sorts of things… very useful, yes yes..

c-0: ^Ah! uh well you can throw it and… it comes back?
c-1: ^Of course we talk! You just don’t notice when you're not paying attention. How else do you think you understand when we ask for food?!

b: ^Yesssss, thank you!! Sorry, I might have chewed on it a little... But it’s still a very good wand, yes yes!! Just a tiny bit chewed, no problem!! Totally fine!!
c: ^Mmm yes... well... I need money! At least a little more money! If not, I guess I’ll have to fetch my luck elsewhere.
d: ^No money?? It seems like you need more money than I do...
e: ^You refused the best wand on the planet?! Just look at its shape! Elegance! Power! Slightly chewed... but still!!
g: ^How dare you! It’s only been lightly chewed... out of love! I see I’m not welcome here. I leave!
i: ^Yesssss you're right!! Sorry, I might have chewed on it a little... But it’s still a very good wand, yes yes!! Just a tiny bit chewed, no problem!! Totally fine!!
